song.title: Moonlight
song.info:
LYRICS:
look to the sky. ready to die. wish i had wings to fly, to get closer to you.
you are so high. wait for the night. i see you standing there trying to find me.
please let me die. do it tonight. i have no else to love, i have nothing to lose.
look to the sky. i'm ready to die. i see you crying there. i'm coming for you.
the night you past away, no last words, nothing to say. i wait for nothingness. last request: take me away.
CHORUS: i'm waiting for the night to see your star in the sky. i'm waiting for the night to see your face in moon- light.
look to the sky. ready to die. i have no reason to live, when i am without you.
you are so high. wait for the night. i see you standing there trying to find me (find me)
please make me die. do it tonight. i want to fly trough the light, i am missing you so.
look to the sky. i'm ready to die. i see you crying there. i'm coming for you.
the night you past away, no last words, nothing to say. i wait for nothingness. last request: take me away.
CHORUS 2x
